title: Pacquiao's Fans Are Confident His Hard Work Will Pay Off Against Mayweather
teaser: In the lead-up to Saturday's mega-bout between premier boxers Floyd Mayweather and Manny Pacquiao, Pacquiao is widely viewed as "the good guy." It's a role the Filipino boxer knows well.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
